message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value, worth $15000 to you, and I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $14000. This is a fantastic chance to secure this valuable asset at a significant discount. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you decide to proceed.
